name: PDF Dekont Parser
description: 🏦 Automatically parses PDF bank receipts and extracts transaction details for Turkish banks. Developed by EC KOLLEKTIF with support for 8+ major Turkish banks including İş Bankası, Garanti BBVA, Akbank, and more.
author: SkyLostTR (@Keeftraum)

settings_schema.header:
Configure the PDF Dekont Parser plugin settings below. This plugin automatically extracts transaction details from PDF bank receipts.

**Developed by SkyLostTR (@Keeftraum)** - For support and feature requests, visit our GitHub repository.
settings_schema.footer:
**Credits:** Developed with ❤️ by SkyLostTR (@Keeftraum)

**Supported Banks:** Türkiye İş Bankası, Garanti BBVA, Akbank, Yapı Kredi, Ziraat Bankası, VakıfBank, Kuveyt Türk, HalkBank

For technical support or to request new bank format support, please visit: https://github.com/SkyLostTR/mattermost-dekont-plugin

settings.help_text: Enable or disable the PDF dekont parsing functionality. When enabled, the plugin will automatically parse PDF bank receipts posted in channels.
If enabled, the plugin will only process PDFs in channels specified in the 'Allowed Channels' setting below.
Comma-separated list of channel names where PDF parsing should be enabled (e.g., 'finance,accounting,payments'). Only used when 'Process Only in Specific Channels' is enabled.
Maximum size of PDF files to process in megabytes. Files larger than this will be ignored.
Custom text to add before the extracted transaction details. Leave empty for no prefix.
Add a timestamp showing when the PDF was processed by the plugin.
Send a message in the channel when PDF processing fails or encounters errors.
Custom message to display when PDF processing fails. Only used when 'Notify on Processing Errors' is enabled.
settings.placeholder: ⚠️ Could not parse PDF bank receipt
settings.default: ⚠️ PDF dekont işlenirken hata oluştu. Lütfen dosyanın geçerli bir banka dekontu olduğundan emin olun.

settings.help_text: Enable detailed debug logging for troubleshooting. Only enable this for debugging purposes as it may impact performance.
